## `SetWindowSize` {#batch-setwindowsize}

Resizes the project's window size to the specified width and height.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetWindowSize(number width,
              number height)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :--  | :-- |
`number` width  | The project window width.
`number` height | The project window height.
